FuncDef:
The description command configures the description for an affinity name mapping template.
The undo description command deletes the description for an affinity name mapping template.
By default, no description is configured.

ParaDef.Info:
Specify the description.
The value is a string of 1 to 80 characters, spaces supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To help remember and manage affinity name mapping templates, run the description command to describe each template. The description contains some characteristics of each affinity name mapping template.
